author: DS
review: Horrible management! Stay away... They are a small socialist society that are forever invading your rights. They step all over you and your rights. If you want to just live and let live then stay way from here. You have absolutely no rights

author: Jill Robey
review: Management and staff are wonderful! Maintenance requests are done in a timely manner. I would highly recommend living here.

author: Nick Rose

author: Shan Main

author: Mike Agnini

review:

author: Carter Thomas
review: Great location near Bellis Fair mall.  The complex is beautifully maintained by hard working staff.  The parking is plenty decent for such a big complex.  It would probably be close to ideal if you could only remove and replace whoever it

author: Bella mango
review:
Theyve cost me now $600 in parking tickets on their private property because i have nowhere to park. If you work nights dont move here.
Edit: Just found mold around a window. On not even three year old apartments.

author: brian DeFries
review: Im giving 1 star, but that is still to good of a rating for this mgmt service. Very pleased when starting process to move in. Once that was complete the respect and professionalism was nonexistent. When asked questions about issues with the

author: Yawen GAO
review: I took a day off to drive to Bellingham for apartment viewing. They forgot about my appointment which I made three days ago, and told me I can't view the unit because they needed 24-hour notice to the current resident. The manager sat at

author: Ahren Rhoden
review: Wildly unprofessional and rude staff, inconsistent application of their rules, frequent passive agressive door mailers, emails, and texts. Grounds are poorly maintained with several major safety hazards. I don't think in my multiple years living here I've met a single neighbor who likes living here

author: Tiarrah Banks
review: Front Desk Receptionist Alena is very unprofessional. This office does not give good customer service, especially for someone who never is late on rent or other utilities.

author: Raphael Grover
review: Great location near Bellis Fair mall.  The complex is beautifully maintained by hard working staff.  The parking is plenty decent for such a big complex.

author: Scott McKeever
review: Poor management.  They don't even regulate their own rules or do anything about them.  The whole place should be shut down.  Or bought by a respectable, responsible, local owner.

author: Jeffery Schwarz
review: They were the worst landlords I have ever had. It seemed to me like they made every attempt to cheat me and squeeze extra money out of me.

author: Jeremy Walker
review: Really nice place to live!

author: Howard Valentine
review: Great meal of Black Cod, scallops, asparagus, corn on the cob, sweet potato and tomatoes

author: Ryan Nelson
review: Very nice neighborhood and the site is well maintained.

author: Jessica Thomas
review: Awful service, office never keeps your paperwork filed properly and when you have copies they argue.

author: Joe Skar
review: I wouldn't wish these apartments on my worst enemy.

author: Tristen rector
review: A little to expensive for my family and I but we called it home.

review: Very beautiful apts...
